name: workflow-management-system
description: AI-powered multi-tenant workflow management system for loan origination

scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.client:dev: if [ -d "client" ]; then cd client && npm run dev; else echo "Client directory not found. This is a server-only setup."; fi
scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.client:build: if [ -d "client" ]; then cd client && npm run build; else echo "Client directory not found. Skipping client build."; fi
scripts.client:start: if [ -d "client" ]; then cd client && npm start; else echo "Client directory not found. This is a server-only setup."; fi
